trans-unit.source: Wraps remoting data for passing between message sinks, either for requests from client to server or for the subsequent responses.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il wrapping dei dati remoti da passare tra sink di messaggio, sia per le richieste dal client al server, sia per le successive risposte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> class is the base class for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes, which wrap messages for method calls on remote objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> classe è la classe base per il <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> e <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classi, il wrapping dei messaggi per le chiamate al metodo sugli oggetti remoti.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> is used by the infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create instances of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>, and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes directly.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario creare istanze di <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>, e <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classi direttamente.

trans-unit.source: A message that acts either as an outgoing method call on a remote object, or as the subsequent response.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio che opera come chiamata al metodo in uscita su un oggetto remoto o come risposta successiva.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> classe viene utilizzata dall'infrastruttura di comunicazione remota di .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> directly.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario creare un <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> direttamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> parameter also implements the derived interface, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>, which indicates that the message acts as a request or as a response on a remote method call.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> parametro implementa anche l'interfaccia derivata, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>, che indica che il messaggio opera come richiesta o come risposta su una chiamata al metodo remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interfaces, in turn, inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> e <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interfacce, a sua volta, ereditano il <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Represents the request or response <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage" /> interface that is wrapped by the message wrapper.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage" /> di richiesta o di risposta inclusa nel wrapper di messaggio.
